00025 SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube::SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube() {
00026 
00027         setCubeSideLength(1);
00028         setNumOfFaces(3);
00029 
00030         double origin[3];
00031         origin[0]=0; origin[1]=0; origin[2]=0;
00032         setOrigin(origin);
00033 
00034         setPointsOnEachSide(10);
00035 }

00061 
00062 void SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube::setNumOfFaces(int numOfFaces)
00063 {
00064         if(numOfFaces<=6){
00065                 this->numOfFaces = numOfFaces;
00066         } else {
00067                 this->numOfFaces = 3;
00068         }
00069 }

00072 void SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube::setOrigin(double origin[3])
00073 {
00074         this->origin[0] = origin[0];
00075         this->origin[1] = origin[1];
00076         this->origin[2] = origin[2];
00077 }

00081 {
00082         this->pointsOnEachSide = pointsOnEachSide;
00083 }

00086 void SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube::getOrigin(double *x, double *y, double *z){
00087         *x = this->origin[0];
00088         *y = this->origin[1];
00089         *z = this->origin[2];
00090 }

00098 void SimplePointCloudGeneratorCube::generatePointCloud(brics_3d::PointCloud3D *generatedPointCloud){
00099 
00100 //      std::cout<< "Generating the cloud" << std::endl;
00101 
00102         double incr = (this->cubeSideLength)/ ((double)(this->pointsOnEachSide));
00103         float xincr, yincr, zincr;
00104         brics_3d::Point3D tempPoint3D;
00105 
00106 //      generatedPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00107         double orgn[3];
00108     orgn[0]= this->origin[0]- this->cubeSideLength/2.0;
00109     orgn[1]= this->origin[0]- this->cubeSideLength/2.0;
00110     orgn[2]= this->origin[0]-this->cubeSideLength/2.0;
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114         for (int face=0; face < numOfFaces; face++) {
00115                 switch(face){
00116 
00117                 case 0:
00118                         //xy-plane
00119                         xincr = orgn[0];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00120                         for (int i = 0; i < pointsOnEachSide; i++){
00121                                 yincr = orgn[1];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00122                                 for (int j = 0; j < pointsOnEachSide; j++) {
00123                                         tempPoint3D.setX(xincr);
00124                                         tempPoint3D.setY(yincr);
00125                                         tempPoint3D.setZ(orgn[2]+cubeSideLength);
00126                                         generatedPointCloud->addPoint(tempPoint3D);
00127                                         yincr += incr;
00128                                 }
00129                                 xincr += incr;
00130                         }
00131                         break;
00132 
00133                 case 1:
00134                         //yz-plane
00135                         yincr = orgn[1];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00136                         for (int i = 0; i < pointsOnEachSide; i++){
00137                                 zincr = orgn[2];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00138                                 for (int j = 0; j < pointsOnEachSide; j++) {
00139                                         tempPoint3D.setX(orgn[0]);
00140                                         tempPoint3D.setY(yincr);
00141                                         tempPoint3D.setZ(zincr);
00142                                         generatedPointCloud->addPoint(tempPoint3D);
00143                                         zincr += incr;
00144                                 }
00145                                 yincr += incr;
00146                         }
00147                         break;
00148 
00149                 case 2:
00150                         //xz-plane
00151                         xincr = orgn[0];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00152                         for (int i = 0; i < pointsOnEachSide; i++){
00153                                 zincr = orgn[2];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;

00160                                 }
00161                                 xincr += incr;
00162                         }
00163 
00164                         break;
00165 
00166                 case 3:
00167 
00168                         xincr = orgn[0];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00169                         for (int i = 0; i < pointsOnEachSide; i++){
00170                                 yincr = orgn[1];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;
00171                                 for (int j = 0; j < pointsOnEachSide; j++) {
00172                                         tempPoint3D.setX(xincr);
00173                                         tempPoint3D.setY(yincr);
00174                                         tempPoint3D.setZ(orgn[2]);

00176                                         yincr += incr;
00177                                 }
00178                                 xincr += incr;
00179                         }
00180                         break;
00181

00183                         //yz-plane

00186                                 zincr = orgn[2];//+maxWidthCube/cloudWidthEachFace;

00188                                         tempPoint3D.setX(orgn[0]+cubeSideLength);
00189                                         tempPoint3D.setY(yincr);
00190                                         tempPoint3D.setZ(zincr);

00216                         break;
